title: Some Principia Mathematica proofs
content: References are made to the second edition (1927, reprinted 1963) of _Principia Mathematica_, Vol. 1. Theorems are referred to in the form "PM*xx.xx".

blocks.name: stdpc5t
blocks.content: Closed form of ~ stdpc5 . (Possible to place it before ~ 19.21t and use it to prove ~ 19.21t ). (Contributed by BJ, 15-Sep-2018.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-stdpc5
blocks.content: More direct proof of ~ stdpc5 . (Contributed by BJ, 15-Sep-2018.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: 2stdpc5
blocks.content: A double ~ stdpc5 (one direction of PM*11.3). See also ~ 2stdpc4 and ~ 19.21vv . (Contributed by BJ, 15-Sep-2018.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-19.21t
blocks.content: Proof of ~ 19.21t from ~ stdpc5t . (Contributed by BJ, 15-Sep-2018.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: exlimii
blocks.content: Inference associated with ~ exlimi . Inferring a theorem when it is implied by an antecedent which may be true. (Contributed by BJ, 15-Sep-2018.)

blocks.name: ax11-pm
blocks.content: Proof of ~ ax-11 similar to PM's proof of ~ alcom (PM*11.2). For a proof closer to PM's proof, see ~ ax11-pm2 . Axiom ~ ax-11 is used in the proof only through ~ nfa2 . (Contributed by BJ, 15-Sep-2018.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: ax6er
blocks.content: Commuted form of ~ ax6e . (Could be placed right after ~ ax6e ). (Contributed by BJ, 15-Sep-2018.)

blocks.name: exlimiieq1
blocks.content: Inferring a theorem when it is implied by an equality which may be true. (Contributed by BJ, 30-Sep-2018.)

blocks.name: exlimiieq2
blocks.content: Inferring a theorem when it is implied by an equality which may be true. (Contributed by BJ, 15-Sep-2018.) (Revised by BJ, 30-Sep-2018.)

blocks.name: ax11-pm2
blocks.content: Proof of ~ ax-11 from the standard axioms of predicate calculus, similar to PM's proof of ~ alcom (PM*11.2). This proof requires that ` x ` and ` y ` be distinct. Axiom ~ ax-11 is used in the proof only through ~ nfal , ~ nfsb , ~ sbal , ~ sb8 . See also ~ ax11-pm . (Contributed by BJ, 15-Sep-2018.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm ax11-pm2(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s1, wal(s0, w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  sylibr(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s1, wal(s0, w0)), wal(hs0, wsb(hs0, s1, wal(s0, w0))))
  sylibr(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(hs0, wsb(hs0, s1, wal(s0, w0))), wal(hs0, wal(s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))))
  sylibr(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(hs0, wal(s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wsb(hs1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)))))
  ax-mp(wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wsb(hs1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))))), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wsb(hs1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))))))
  gen2(hs0, hs1, wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wsb(hs1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))))
  2stdpc4(s0, s1, hs1, hs0, w0)
  2stdpc5(hs0, hs1, wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wsb(hs1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)))
  nfal(hs0, s0, wal(s1, w0))
  nfal(hs0, s1, w0)
  nfal(hs1, s0, wal(s1, w0))
  nfal(hs1, s1, w0)
  albii(hs0, wal(s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)), wal(hs1, wsb(hs1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))))
  sb8(s0, hs1, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))
  nfsb(hs1, hs0, s1, w0)
  nfv(hs1, w0)
  albii(hs0, wsb(hs0, s1, wal(s0, w0)), wal(s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)))
  sbal(hs0, s1, s0, w0)
  sb8(s1, hs0, wal(s0, w0))
  nfal(hs0, s0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ax11-pm2(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0, ∀(s1, w0))→ ∀(s1, ∀(s0, w0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  sylibr(∀(s0, ∀(s1, w0)), ∀(s1, ∀(s0, w0)), ∀(hs0,[hs0 / s1]∀(s0, w0)))
  sylibr(∀(s0, ∀(s1, w0)), ∀(hs0,[hs0 / s1]∀(s0, w0)), ∀(hs0, ∀(s0,[hs0 / s1]w0)))
  sylibr(∀(s0, ∀(s1, w0)), ∀(hs0, ∀(s0,[hs0 / s1]w0)), ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1,[hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0)))
  ax-mp((∀(s0, ∀(s1, w0))→ ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1,[hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0))), ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1,(∀(s0, ∀(s1, w0))→[hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0))))
  gen2(hs0, hs1, (∀(s0, ∀(s1, w0))→[hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0))
  2stdpc4(s0, s1, hs1, hs0, w0)
  2stdpc5(hs0, hs1, ∀(s0, ∀(s1, w0)), [hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0)
  nfal(hs0, s0, ∀(s1, w0))
  nfal(hs0, s1, w0)
  nfal(hs1, s0, ∀(s1, w0))
  nfal(hs1, s1, w0)
  albii(hs0, ∀(s0,[hs0 / s1]w0), ∀(hs1,[hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0))
  sb8(s0, hs1, [hs0 / s1]w0)
  nfsb(hs1, hs0, s1, w0)
  nfv(hs1, w0)
  albii(hs0, [hs0 / s1]∀(s0, w0), ∀(s0,[hs0 / s1]w0))
  sbal(hs0, s1, s0, w0)
  sb8(s1, hs0, ∀(s0, w0))
  nfal(hs0, s0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
